sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Suspicious macOS Sandbox Evasion for VT
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects the use of osascript to execute 'system_profiler' for 'SPHardwareDataType' or 'SPMemoryDataType'. This technique is used to check for virtualization artifacts (like 'QEMU', 'VMware', 'KVM') or specific hardware identifiers, a known defense evasion method used by malware such as the AMOS Stealer. Also 'Z31FHXYQ0J' is the current macOS serial on Zenbox.

match_context.values: @{CommandLine=sh -c osascript -e 'set memData to do shell script "system_profiler SPMemoryDataType"set hardwareData to do shell script "system_profiler SPHardwareDataType"if memData contains "QEMU" or memData contains "VMware" or memData contains "KVM" or hardwareData contains "Z31FHXYQ0J" or hardwareData contains "C07T508TG1J2" or hardwareData contains "C02TM2ZBHX87" or hardwareData contains "Chip: Unknown" or hardwareData contains "Intel Core 2" then    set exitCode to 100else    set exitCode to 0end ifdo s [TRUNCATED]; Image=sh; EventID=1}

@{CommandLine=osascript -e set memData to do shell script "system_profiler SPMemoryDataType"set hardwareData to do shell script "system_profiler SPHardwareDataType"if memData contains "QEMU" or memData contains "VMware" or memData contains "KVM" or hardwareData contains "Z31FHXYQ0J" or hardwareData contains "C07T508TG1J2" or hardwareData contains "C02TM2ZBHX87" or hardwareData contains "Chip: Unknown" or hardwareData contains "Intel Core 2" then    set exitCode to 100else    set exitCode to 0end ifdo shell sc [TRUNCATED]; Image=osascript; EventID=1}

@{CommandLine=/usr/bin/osascript osascript -e set memData to do shell script "system_profiler SPMemoryDataType"set hardwareData to do shell script "system_profiler SPHardwareDataType"if memData contains "QEMU" or memData contains "VMware" or memData contains "KVM" or hardwareData contains "Z31FHXYQ0J" or hardwareData contains "C07T508TG1J2" or hardwareData contains "C02TM2ZBHX87" or hardwareData contains "Chip: Unknown" or hardwareData contains "Intel Core 2" then    set exitCode to 100else    set exitCode to [TRUNCATED]; Image=/usr/bin/osascript; EventID=1}

@{CommandLine=sh -c osascript -e 'set memData to do shell script 'system_profiler SPMemoryDataType'set hardwareData to do shell script 'system_profiler SPHardwareDataType'if memData contains 'QEMU' or memData contains 'VMware' or memData contains 'KVM' or hardwareData contains 'Z31FHXYQ0J' or hardwareData contains 'C07T508TG1J2' or hardwareData contains 'C02TM2ZBHX87' or hardwareData contains 'Chip: Unknown' or hardwareData contains 'Intel Core 2' then    set exitCode to 100else    set exitCode to 0end ifdo s [TRUNCATED]; Image=sh; EventID=1}

@{CommandLine=osascript -e set memData to do shell script 'system_profiler SPMemoryDataType'set hardwareData to do shell script 'system_profiler SPHardwareDataType'if memData contains 'QEMU' or memData contains 'VMware' or memData contains 'KVM' or hardwareData contains 'Z31FHXYQ0J' or hardwareData contains 'C07T508TG1J2' or hardwareData contains 'C02TM2ZBHX87' or hardwareData contains 'Chip: Unknown' or hardwareData contains 'Intel Core 2' then    set exitCode to 100else    set exitCode to 0end ifdo shell sc [TRUNCATED]; Image=osascript; EventID=1}

sigma_analysis_results.rule_description:
Detects the execution of "system_profiler" with specific "Data Types" that have been seen being used by threat actors and malware. It provides system hardware and software configuration information.
This process is primarily used for system information discovery. However, "system_profiler" can also be used to determine if virtualization software is being run for defense evasion purposes.

match_context.values: @{CommandLine=sh -c osascript -e 'set memData to do shell script "system_profiler SPMemoryDataType"set hardwareData to do shell script "system_profiler SPHardwareDataType"if memData contains "QEMU" or memData contains "VMware" or memData contains "KVM" or hardwareData contains "Z31FHXYQ0J" or hardwareData contains "C07T508TG1J2" or hardwareData contains "C02TM2ZBHX87" or hardwareData contains "Chip: Unknown" or hardwareData contains "Intel Core 2" then    set exitCode to 100else    set exitCode to 0end ifdo s [TRUNCATED]; Image=sh; EventID=1}

@{CommandLine=osascript -e set memData to do shell script "system_profiler SPMemoryDataType"set hardwareData to do shell script "system_profiler SPHardwareDataType"if memData contains "QEMU" or memData contains "VMware" or memData contains "KVM" or hardwareData contains "Z31FHXYQ0J" or hardwareData contains "C07T508TG1J2" or hardwareData contains "C02TM2ZBHX87" or hardwareData contains "Chip: Unknown" or hardwareData contains "Intel Core 2" then    set exitCode to 100else    set exitCode to 0end ifdo shell sc [TRUNCATED]; Image=osascript; EventID=1}

sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects execution of AppleScript of the macOS scripting language AppleScript.

match_context.values: @{CommandLine=/usr/bin/osascript osascript -e set memData to do shell script "system_profiler SPMemoryDataType"set hardwareData to do shell script "system_profiler SPHardwareDataType"if memData contains "QEMU" or memData contains "VMware" or memData contains "KVM" or hardwareData contains "Z31FHXYQ0J" or hardwareData contains "C07T508TG1J2" or hardwareData contains "C02TM2ZBHX87" or hardwareData contains "Chip: Unknown" or hardwareData contains "Intel Core 2" then    set exitCode to 100else    set exitCode to [TRUNCATED]; Image=/usr/bin/osascript; EventID=1}

@{CommandLine=/usr/bin/osascript osascript -e set memData to do shell script 'system_profiler SPMemoryDataType'set hardwareData to do shell script 'system_profiler SPHardwareDataType'if memData contains 'QEMU' or memData contains 'VMware' or memData contains 'KVM' or hardwareData contains 'Z31FHXYQ0J' or hardwareData contains 'C07T508TG1J2' or hardwareData contains 'C02TM2ZBHX87' or hardwareData contains 'Chip: Unknown' or hardwareData contains 'Intel Core 2' then    set exitCode to 100else    set exitCode to [TRUNCATED]; Image=/usr/bin/osascript; EventID=1}

sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects commandline operations on shell history files

attributes.magic: DOS/MBR boot sector, extended partition table (last) (zlib compressed data)

threat_severity.level_description: Severity MEDIUM because it was considered trojan.

crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_msg: (stream_tcp) data sent on stream after TCP reset sent
crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_raw: alert ( gid:129; sid:8; rev:2; msg:"(stream_tcp) data sent on stream after TCP reset sent"; metadata: policy max-detect-ips drop, rule-type preproc; classtype:protocol-command-decode;)
